abort.link_local_address: Link local addresses are not supported
abort.missing_configuration: The LaMetric integration is not configured. Please follow the documentation.
abort.no_devices: The authorized user has no LaMetric devices
abort.no_url_available: No URL available. For information about this error, [check the help section]({docs_url})
abort.oauth_unauthorized: OAuth authorization error while obtaining access token.
abort.reauth_device_not_found: The device you are trying to re-authenticate is not found in this LaMetric account

choice_enter_manual_or_fetch_cloud.description:
A LaMetric device can be set up in Home Assistant in two different ways.

You can enter all device information and API tokens yourself, or Home Asssistant can import them from your LaMetric.com account.

data_description.api_key: You can find this API key in [devices page in your LaMetric developer account](https://developer.lametric.com/user/devices).
data_description.host: The IP address or hostname of your LaMetric TIME on your network.

data.device: Select the LaMetric device to add

chart.description: Displays a chart on a LaMetric device.

cycles.description: The number of times to display the message. When set to 0, the message will be displayed until dismissed.
cycles.name: Cycles

data.description: The list of data points in the chart.
data.name: Data

device_id.description: The LaMetric device to display the chart on.
device_id.name: Device

icon_type.description: The type of icon to display, indicating the nature of the notification.
icon_type.name: Icon type

priority.description: The priority of the notification. When the device is running in screensaver or kiosk mode, only critical priority notifications will be accepted.
priority.name: Priority

chart.name: Display a chart

message.description: Displays a message with an optional icon on a LaMetric device.

cycles.description: The number of times to display the message. When set to 0, the message will be displayed until dismissed.
cycles.name: Cycles

device_id.description: The LaMetric device to display the message on.
device_id.name: Device

icon.description: The ID number of the icon or animation to display. List of all icons and their IDs can be found at: https://developer.lametric.com/icons.
icon.name: Icon

icon_type.description: The type of icon to display, indicating the nature of the notification.
icon_type.name: Icon type

priority.description: The priority of the notification. When the device is running in screensaver or kiosk mode, only critical priority notifications will be accepted.
priority.name: Priority

message.name: Display a message
